name: Stealth farmer
description:
Submission for LudiumDare 41

This is a game where you sneak around, plant crops and make money. 

Plant, harvest, sell, repeat, while enemies are around the corner.

The tutorial can be a bit confusing, so I made a playthrough of it

WASD to move, mouse to move camera, pick up/use items with leftclick, change items with numbers, and use space to climb the ladder (brown wall)
